root_object.name: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM

process_model.name: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM
process_model.description: The process model to post vendor addition/deletion in an evaluation to VM

inputs.input_expression: =rule!AS_GSS_BL_constructVendorActionDetailsForVM( evaluation: pv!evaluation, evaluationVendors: pv!evaluationVendors, isAddAction: pv!isAddAction)

gateway_conditions.condition: = or( rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: pv!isAddAction), rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty( value: pv!evaluationVendors[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.externalVendorId] ), not( cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE ))

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_sendEmailProcessParameters
expression_rules.description: Rule having the process parameters for send email process in GSS

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!fontDetails: rule!AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_wrapper(),
  {
    ccRecipient: ri!ccRecipient,
    closing: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closing,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_ThankYou",
        arguments: ","
      )
    ),
    closingSender: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closingSender,
      default: "Source Selection Admin"
    ),
    content: ri!content,
    greeting: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!greeting,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_Hello",
        arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnUserFirstName(username: ri!sendTo) & ","
      )
    ),
    sendTo: ri!sendTo,
    subject: ri!subject,
    fontFamily: index(local!fontDetails, "fontFamily", null),
    fontSize: index(local!fontDetails, "fontSize", null),
    backgroundColor: index(
      local!fontDetails,
      "backgroundColor",
      null
    ),
    fontColor: index(local!fontDetails, "fontColor", null)
  }
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!fontDetails: rule!AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_wrapper(),
  {
    ccRecipient: ri!ccRecipient,
    closing: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closing,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_ThankYou",
        arguments: ","
      )
    ),
    closingSender: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!closingSender,
      default: "Source Selection Admin"
    ),
    content: ri!content,
    greeting: a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!greeting,
      default: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        bundleKey: "txt_Hello",
        arguments: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnUserFirstName(username: ri!sendTo) & ","
      )
    ),
    sendTo: ri!sendTo,
    subject: ri!subject,
    fontFamily: index(local!fontDetails, "fontFamily", null),
    fontSize: index(local!fontDetails, "fontSize", null),
    backgroundColor: index(
      local!fontDetails,
      "backgroundColor",
      null
    ),
    fontColor: index(local!fontDetails, "fontColor", null)
  }
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_constructVendorActionDetailsForVM
expression_rules.description: The rule to construct data when a vendor gets added to an evaluation.
called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_FontDetailsForEmailTemplate_wrapper
expression_rules.description: This rule returns the Emails Font Details for all the mails

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
expression_rules.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl
expression_rules.description: Returns the URL of the site, terminating in /suite/

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_constructEmailContentForIntegrationFailure
expression_rules.description: Returns constructed email body content to notify Admins on integration failures

inputs.name: integrationError
inputs.description: pass the integration error from the process

test_inputs.input_value:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integrationError"(
  title: "The external system cannot support the request",
  message: "405 - The requested URL does not support the PUT method",
  detail: "HTTP/1.1 405 Method not allowed"
)

called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_returnUserFirstName
expression_rules.description: Rule to return the user's first name

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_castToDictionary
expression_rules.description: Casts the input to dictionary, either a list or a non-list depending on the input

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_returnMembersOfAllGroups
expression_rules.description: Returns all unique members who are members of ALL of the input groups, the members must be in each of the groups

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}UserOrGroup?list',
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!groups),
    {},
    with(
      local!groupMembersResults: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!groups,
        expression: a!groupMembers(
          group: fv!item,
          direct: ri!onlyDirectMembers,
          memberType: ri!memberType,
          pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: cons!AS_CO_INT_GROUP_QUERY_MAX_BATCH_SIZE)
        )
      ),

      local!membersOfAnyGroup: a!flatten(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!groupMembersResults,
        expression: fv!item.data
      )),

      local!membersOfAllGroups: reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnMembersOfAllGroups_intersectionHandler(
          previous: _,
          groupMembersResult: _
        ),
        local!membersOfAnyGroup,
        local!groupMembersResults
      ),

      rule!AS_CO_UT_distinct(local!membersOfAllGroups)
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}UserOrGroup?list',
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!groups),
    {},
    with(
      local!groupMembersResults: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!groups,
        expression: a!groupMembers(
          group: fv!item,
          direct: ri!onlyDirectMembers,
          memberType: ri!memberType,
          pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: cons!AS_CO_INT_GROUP_QUERY_MAX_BATCH_SIZE)
        )
      ),
      
      local!membersOfAnyGroup: a!flatten(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!groupMembersResults,
        expression: fv!item.data
      )),
      
      local!membersOfAllGroups: reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnMembersOfAllGroups_intersectionHandler(
          previous: _, 
          groupMembersResult: _
        ),
        local!membersOfAnyGroup,
        local!groupMembersResults
      ),
      
      rule!AS_CO_UT_distinct(local!membersOfAllGroups)
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_FRM_determineRuntimeRule
expression_rules.description: Returns the runtime rule for a default rule, uses plugin function `determineRuntimeRule()`

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_emailBodyForIntegrationFailure
expression_rules.description: Email body to be sent to admin users on integration failure

data.sail_code:
concat( "Problem: ", ri!integrationError.title, "

Message: ", ri!integrationError.message, "

Detail: ", ri!integrationError.detail, "

View process for this task" )
data.definition:
concat( "Problem: ", ri!integrationError.title, "

Message: ", ri!integrationError.message, "

Detail: ", ri!integrationError.detail, "

View process for this task" )

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_emailSubjectForIntegrationFailure
expression_rules.description: Construct email subject for integration failure to be sent to admin group

data.sail_code: "An error occurred when trying to connect to the external system"
data.definition: "An error occurred when trying to connect to the external system"

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

constants.name: AS_GSS_GRP_ALERTS
constants.description: Value: AS GSS Designer Alerts Group

constants.name: AS_CO_INT_GROUP_QUERY_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
constants.description: Value: 10000 - The maximum size to pass to all group queries to avoid accidentally querying too much data

constants.name: AS_GSS_ENUM_VENDOR_ACTION_DELETED
constants.description: Value : 2 (This will indicate a vendor removed from an evaluation to VM)

constants.name: AS_GSS_PM_SEND_EMAIL
called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM

constants.name: AS_GSS_ENUM_VENDOR_ACTION_ADDED
constants.description: Value : 1 (This will indicate a vendor added in an evaluation to VM)

constants.name: AS_FRM_BOOL_RULE_CUSTOMIZATION_1_0_ENABLED
constants.description: Returns true if customizable rules using the 1.0 SDK is enabled

constants.name: AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
constants.description: Toggle to enable Vendor Management Integration in GSS. This is used to enable Add vendor feature from VM to GSS. Default value will be false.
called_by: AS GSS Update Vendor Action to VM

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId,

      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier

      align: "END"

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,

    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",

      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Total Task",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalTaskCount,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalTaskCount],
      align: "START"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed Task",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount],
      align: "START"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
